content: Slow progress little imagination. The game had potential but the rate of which you can progress is too slow. There is little to do but wait most of the time. Nothing you do in the game has any real impact on your progress. Very frustrating as it had plenty of potential. There is nothing "thrifty" about the game. You don't get to select from stock. You get options to sell ice cream and install vending machines which have nothing to do with a thrift shop. Poor game. Sorry I wasted the money.

I'm a huge fan of Kairosofts paid single player economic strategy sims going all the way back to Game Dev Story, the smash hit that put Kairo on the map in English speaking markets. This is the worst game Kairosoft charges money for, and between apple and android I've purchased almost every full title. This feels like a half-finished student project released in a blatant attempt to milk fans of Kairos' typically high production value. Steer clear of this smelly turd.
Great Game
Missing alot...
Usually like their games... Not this one. Its dull... Really dull. And im having an issue with it saving.
Repetitive
like it a lot... cool kairo style classic
pretty simple
graphic unable to zoom in zoom out..doesnt fit properly on phone
The worst kairosoft game of all time. The pictures don't even march the actual game and why is it so hard to get 100% progress in some areas.
I don't mind that it's simple but because there's no in-game tutorial I can't figure out the basics of ordering stock and thereby can't play the game properly.
An old game not as polished as newer ones. Wish they didn't charge so much for it
worst of all the kairosofts. first 10 min is same as last 10.

doesn't seem to have as advanced mechanics as your newer games (this ganes from 2012) but this is a game that I can actually sit back and chill while playing rather than dive in and indulge myself. It just goes to show you that a game can be simple, elegant and fun. The reason I gave 4 stars was because it took me a while to understand the game without some sort of tutorial but other than that its a classic and simple game. my type of game

A very fun, classic Kairosoft game. This game is and older port from Kairosoft, thus lacking some of the complexity of newer Kairosoft titles. Still a fun casual game. My only complaint is lack of replayability like other Kairosoft titles
It is alright. For a older Kairosoft game. I heard there is a untranslated game about a art gallery. I hope that gets translated some day.
unfathomably dull. don't bother
I love the kirosoft games but for 6.99 this is seriously lacking this should have been one of the free ones
This is by far the worst kairosoft game released. Would be better, if there were more challenges and upgrades to apply to your store.
I have played every paid Kairosoft game and this one disappointed me the worst in terms of story line, depth of gameplay
$5 for this really one of the simplest kairosoft games out there
why people gave 1* ? So i will check it by myself.

Ok, this is an old game repurposed for the global audience ... but it is STILL an old game, and as such, has a distinctive lack of features and challenge compared to the recent entries. Which in itself would be fine, however, you are charging MORE for this title. Sigh
Very chill old fashion Kariosoft. If you are new to their games not the best choice, I recommend sushi spinner. If you like their games well worth it.
Dull, lacking any depth and quite disappointing.

This was an honest disappointment to see from Kairosoft. I have bought every game from them so far and this one clearly was not worked on as hard as the other titles. I hope they can redeem themselves on their next title, because this one is utterly disappointing.
Boring. Very few features and tasks.
Horrible.
I just love kairosoft game no matter what
